Text: Sry for my bad upload speed :(
does this thing work ok ? i hope it does, cant wait to get home : )
Can you upload the crack alone? I can download the patch itself from any other place a lot faster than my azureus does, it's the crack that's a problem.

to Kian2:
Depending on your torrent application, it's possible to download only the crack. Personally I have Azureus, which allowes me to select the files I wish to d-load.

----------------

I did donwload only the 5MB crack, took only a minute. I just tested it, but no luck: Game crashed due to an "unspesific error" right after the loading screen had been visible for 2 sec.

It might be because I had a mod installed (lands to conquer) but I dunno... Right now I'm d-loading the whole package and I'm going to install the patch and apply the ck to an untouched copy of ME II which I saved before modding - thank god.

I'll let you guys know if it works or what.

Hopefully someone else would also post here and let us know if this works on his PC.

Well well... I really hoped that this would work, because the game is so unbelievably buggy and unfixed on version 1.0 or 1.1

I patched and applied the crack, then that goddamn "unspesific error" and the game crashed after a few seconds of the loading-screen.

Hopefully someone ups a working 1.2 crack soon.
Thanks! =) Works fine! If you want to only download the crack, just desellect the other things since the patch and crack are packed seperatly =)

After tweaking the crack for hours I finally got it to work. I had to reinstall the ME II game, since I found out from the syslogs that some of the files were missing.

I guess I cocked up the mod installing or whatever the hell.

Anyway, it works. Thank god. And shadow_ghost also :D
